docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project links Page 1 Page 2 Page 3 Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. doc1.md # The documentation for 'MyClass' doc2.md # The documentation for foo.bar
docs.title: Home
